DOC.brief_summary: To show one MRI contrast agent well another one diagnosis malignant breast lesion compare histopathology
DOC.criteria: Provides write informed consent Female Age 18 year older Suspicious know breast lesion base result mammography ultrasound Planned undergo histological diagnosis breast lesion non surgical biopsy breast surgery within 30 day MRI exam Body weight > 100 kg Pregnant lactating Server endstage organ failure Moderate severe renal impairment Undergoing radiotherapy complete radiotherapy last 18 month Chemotherapy within 6 month 1st MRI exam
